SELECT e.`id`, e.`password`, e.`name`, e.`authority`, e.`sex`, e.`birthday`, d.`name` AS department, #部门 j.`description` AS job, # 工作名称 ed.`description` AS eduLevel, #学历 e.`spcialty`, e.`address`, e.`tel`, e.`email`, e.`state`, e.`remark` FROM employee e, department d, edu_level ed, job j WHERE e.`department` = d.`id` AND e.`job` = j.`code` AND e.`edu_level` = ed.`code`
and e.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT e.`id`, e.`password`, e.`name`, e.`authority`, e.`sex`, e.`birthday`, d.`name` AS department, #部门 j.`description` AS job, # 工作名称 ed.`description` AS eduLevel, #学历 e.`spcialty`, e.`address`, e.`tel`, e.`email`, e.`state`, e.`remark` FROM employee e, department d, edu_level ed, job j WHERE e.`department` = d.`id` AND e.`job` = j.`code` AND e.`edu_level` = ed.`code` AND e.id = ${id}
SELECT j.description AS job, e.number FROM (SELECT job AS CODE, COUNT(*) AS number FROM employee GROUP BY job) AS e INNER JOIN job j ON e.code = j.`code`
